spec_data.Name: lvm2-cluster-standalone
spec_data.Description:
Additional files needed to run clustered LVM2 daemon and clustered volume
activation in standalone mode as services without cluster resource manager
involvement (e.g. pacemaker).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 26 Oct 2017 08:27:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Additional files to support clustered LVM2 in standalone mode
